binary search
#include <stdio.h>
#include <conio.h>
#define MAX 100


int binary(int x[], int low, int high, int key)
{
    int mid;
    if (low > high)
        return -1;
    mid = (low + high) / 2;
    if (x[mid] == key)
        return mid;
    if (x[mid] > low)
        return binary(x, mid + 1, high, key);
    else
        return binary(x, low, mid - 1, key);
}


void main()
{
    int x[MAX], n, i, key, index;


    printf("\nEnter n ");
    scanf("%d", &n);


    printf("\nEnter elements ");
    for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
        scanf("%d", &x[i]);


    printf("\nEnter element to be searched: ");
    scanf("%d", &key);
    index = binary(x, 0, n - 1, key);


    if (index < 0)
        printf("Element not found %d!", key);
    else
        printf("%d Element at %d index.", key, index);


    getch();
}
